channel.title: ~Desolution Updated and coded version of Epicurus ~ Finally Released~ best 317!~
channel.description:
HEY EVERYONE! I AM RELEASING EPICURUS UPDATED AND CODED VERSION! including fixed client... Me and a couple of friends have personally worked on this quite a'lot we have even added highscores, auto-donate, auto-cache downloader, and a'lot more.. This is a server that is still running and going good but one of our team mates let us down so I am releasing it for everyone to have it and use it and maybe take it further ahead hopefully..... We have personally added quite a'lot of continent to it and spent alot of time into coding this source but I guess it's time for it to go. More than 60% of the coding was done by the person who released epicurus but the rest is our work.
Normal Epicurus continents:
Grand Exchange Flawless party room Lottery Dicing Multiple world support Cross-world player list support Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) Flawless duel arena, with staking Flawless shopping system Flawless banking system, with searching. Flawless farming system PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc Rank Icon changing system Flawless loyalty title system Flawless donator system Refined item definition system New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. Event schedule system New character file system (credits to Lin for the format) Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally) Perfect curse system Weapon combination selection in duel arena Advanced MySQL system Special client ::brony mode And much, much more.
Tools featured in the release: AccountScanner - locates items on accounts. AccountFinder - quickly finds an account you specify (was necessary when trying to look through 250k+ accounts) BasicDecryptor - decrypts player passwords. EpicurusRelayServer - relays data between words, player counts, chat, logins, etc. EpicurusShopEditor - self explanatory. EpicurusClueRewardEditor - self explanatory. ScheduledEventManager - allows you to create/modify events (halloween events, christmas, etc) EpicurusItemEditor - allows you to modify item bonuses, child ids, shop value, etc
================================================== ============================
We have re-wrote the combat system, range, mage, and range. HP points have been re-written. Cache has been coded and custom made. Client has been patched and updated. Coded and fixed 95% of the dupes and bugs. Fixed more than 85% of all skills. Fixed fishing. Re-wrote firemaking. Fixed magic logs glitch and alot more.... check it out. ================================================== ============ The current website for this server is: Desolution - The Most Innovative RSPS Hate those guys for backstabbing me! ================================================== ============= Download client here: http://up.ht/1g1O8pi
Download source here: http://up.ht/19Wg7BR
Cache Link here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/h8babvivl19tn3l/.epicurus.cache.7z
Cache is auto-downloaded, If it does not work please use the Cache Link above to download it manually. ================================================== ================================================ Please dont hate and do not re-release without my permission thanks. ============================================================== pics: UPLOAD.EE - deso_login_page.png - Download
2nd pic: UPLOAD.EE - deso_learn_2.png - Download
3rd pic: UPLOAD.EE - deso_chrarc_choose_3.png - Download
4th pic: UPLOAD.EE - deso_quest_tab_4.png - Download
5th pic: UPLOAD.EE - deso_skills_5.png - Download
6th pic: UPLOAD.EE - deso_world_choose_6.png - Download ================================================== ================= I'm sorry this is all the pics I could get ATM but feel free to check the server out and leech it if you wish there is a anti-leech on it guys but it's really easy to figure it out. Enjoy! Please don't hate or no rude comments, and YES this is my first release. Please don't FLAME! thanks. If links are down please comment and I will update them. thanks. ================================================== ================================================== ==========
credits: Epicurus 70%, Rune-server 9% - tutorials and snippets Moparscape 20% - tuts Me: 1% for doing some work ================================================== ==========================================================
